fields.summary: Android:  make sure ListView with custom selector on 3.0+ utilizes the default theme drawables on the device for rows that don't have any custom background properties.

comments.body:
Closing bug. Verified fix on:

SDK build: 1.9.0.v20120209183134
Runtime: V8, Rhino
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201262211
Device: Galaxy Tab 10.1 (3.2)

Note: Used TIMOB-4646 as a test case to verify fix.
